tool_description: H&M API helps to query for all information about regions, categories, products, etc... as on official websites
name: HM - Hennes Mauritz
title: HM - Hennes Mauritz

api_list.name: products/detail

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The country code that is gotten from /regions/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: The language code that is gotten from /regions/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: productcode
required_parameters.description: The value of articles/code json object returned in /products/list endpoint

api_list.name: categories/list

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The country code that is gotten from /regions/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: The language code that is gotten from /regions/list endpoint

api_list.name: products/list
api_list.description: List products from H&M with options to sort, filter, or search for products by name

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: The language code that is gotten from /regions/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: currentpage
required_parameters.description: The page index to get data, start from 0

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The country code that is gotten from /regions/list endpoint

required_parameters.name: pagesize
required_parameters.description: The number of records to return in each page

optional_parameters.name: qualities
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"qualities\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple qualities

optional_parameters.name: fits
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"fits\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple fits

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description: It is tagCodes field gotten from /categories/list endpoint, pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple categories

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: One of the following ascPrice|descPrice|stock|newProduct, default is stock

optional_parameters.name: collection
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"collection\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple collection

optional_parameters.name: sizes
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"sizes\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple sizes

optional_parameters.name: colorWithNames
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"colorWithNames\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple colors

optional_parameters.name: contexts
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"contexts\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple contexts

optional_parameters.name: functions
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"functions\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple functions

optional_parameters.name: concepts
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"concepts\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple concepts

optional_parameters.name: descriptiveLengths
optional_parameters.description: Look for the value in \"facets\" object with \"code\": \"descriptiveLengths\", pass this param multiple times to filter by multiple lengths

api_list.name: products/search-by-barcode
regions/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apidojo-hm-hennes-mauritz-v1.p.rapidapi.com/regions/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apidojo-hm-hennes-mauritz-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://apidojo-hm-hennes-mauritz-v1.p.rapidapi.com/regions/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apidojo-hm-hennes-mauritz-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
